message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds an intrinsic value of $12,000 to you. However, to ensure a fair transaction, I propose a price of $11,000 for this remarkable item. This offer not only provides you with significant savings but also secures a high-quality asset that aligns with your needs. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this opportunity to fruition.
